annotations.description: This is an original drink inspired by Black Panther and named after their catchphrase, Wakanda Forever. It’s made with Mezcal, Coffee Liqueur and Fernet. It’...
annotations.title: Oaxaca Forever - a Mezcal Cocktail Inspired by Black Panther & the Hidden History Behind Wakanda

textContent:
1.5 oz (45 ml) Mezcal (smoky)
0.75 oz (22 ml) Coffee Liqueur
0.5 oz (15 ml) Fernet

Add ingredients to an Old-Fashioned glass. Add ice, stir. Top off with more ice.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EtG4pdk24o0
title: Oaxaca Forever
